... Skulletron thinks back. I.....I don t know how I got to this planet.  All I know is that I ve been

::Skulletron::

Skulletron thinks back.

"I.....I don't know how I got to this planet.  All I know is that I've bee=
n
buried for thousands of solar cycles, and I rose up from the ground below=
,"
he answered.

-------Original Message-------

From: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Date: August 10, 2002 01:49:43 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: Skullentron/Wolfenstein/megatron

Perceptor::

Perceptor looked to Skulletron and said "How did you arrived here?"




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@r...> wrote:
> ::Skulletron::
>=20



> Skulletron smiled and waited for Megatron to let them come in.  He=20
observed
> the base's exterior while waiting...
>=20
> -------Original Message-------
>=20
> From: nbwrpg@y...
> Date: August 10, 2002 01:42:58 AM
> To: nbwrpg@y...
> Subject: Skullentron/Wolfenstein/megatron
>=20
> Perceptor::
>=20
> "Yess that name says all"replied Perceptor while he opened comm=20
link=20
> with Megatron "Perceptor to Megatron. do you copy? We've arrived to=20
> base... we're outside as you commanded"
>=20
>=20
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@r...> wrote:
> > ::Skulletron::
> >=20
> > "Ok, I assumed that,  hearing the name Megatron and all," he said.
> >=20
> > -------Original Message-------
> >=20
> > From: nbwrpg@y...
> > Date: August 10, 2002 01:29:08 AM
> > To: nbwrpg@y...
> > Subject: Re: Wolfenstein, Perceptor Approaching...
> >=20
> > Perceptor::
> >=20
> > "Predacons..."answered Perceptor
> >=20
> >=20
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@r...> wrote:
> > > OOC:  I hate this restart.  I had to take a shot at it sometime!
> > > BIC:
> > > Skulletron had the slight feeling that Wolfenstein was=20
insulting=20
> > him for a
> > > second, but then he realized he himself hardly knew what he was=20
> > talking
> > > about.  Maybe his circuits were acting up. =20
> > > He smiled and said, "At last, closer to the base."
> > > He paused for a minute, and asked, "Excuse me, exactly what=20
> faction=20
> > does this base belong to?"
> >=20
> >=20
> > Yahoo! Groups Sponsor
> > ADVERTISEMENT
> >=20
> >=20
> >=20
> > Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of=20
Service.
>=20
>=20
> Yahoo! Groups Sponsor
> ADVERTISEMENT
>=20
>=20
>=20
> Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.
